info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 06 at 3:20PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. For the Blizzard Warning, ground blizzard conditions expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the Blizzard Warning, from Midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions this afternoon and evening due to ongoing snowfall. Then strong winds are expected to develop tonight into Wednesday and cause extensive blowing and drifting of snow. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility at times this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
